# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.1.0/)
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [Unreleased]

## [0.2.0]

- Add redesign mode to generate visual concept alternatives.
- Auto-render redesign concepts using NanoBanana (Gemini image generation).
- Include render metadata (aspect ratio, frame, size) in redesign outputs.
- Improve local preview to browse concepts with a full-size viewer.

## [0.1.2]

- Add cross-screenshot style consistency analysis with multi-image prompts.

## [0.1.1]

- Add optional authenticated crawling with pre/post login capture.
- Add Gemini retry/timeout handling for more stable runs.
- Document login usage with sample credentials.

## [0.1.0]

- Initial release.
- Playwright capture and Gemini analysis pipeline.
